name: Personalized 2-Day Meal Plan
title: Personalized 2-Day Meal Plan
description: Tailored to your health goals and preferences

meals.description: Protein-rich Greek yogurt topped with berries and nuts
instructions: Place Greek yogurt in a bowl
Top with fresh blueberries
Sprinkle sliced almonds and chia seeds
Drizzle honey over the top
Mix gently and serve immediately
meals.goal_alignment: High protein content promotes satiety while keeping calories controlled for weight loss

meals.food_name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad with Grilled Chicken
meals.description: Nutrient-dense quinoa salad with lean protein and fresh vegetables
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package directions, let cool
Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and oregano
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through
Dice cucumber, halve cherry tomatoes, thinly slice red onion
Whisk olive oil with lemon juice and oregano
Combine quinoa with vegetables and dressing
Top with sliced grilled chicken and crumbled feta
Let flavors meld for 10 minutes before serving
meals.goal_alignment: Balanced meal with lean protein and complex carbs for sustained energy and satiety

meals.food_name: Baked Cod with Roasted Vegetables and Sweet Potato
meals.description: Light, flaky fish with colorful roasted vegetables
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Cube sweet potato and place on baking sheet
Cut zucchini, bell pepper, and broccoli into bite-sized pieces
Toss vegetables with half the olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper
Roast vegetables for 25 minutes
Season cod with salt, pepper, and thyme
Heat remaining oil in oven-safe pan, sear cod 3 minutes
Flip cod, add to oven for final 8-10 minutes
Serve cod over roasted vegetables with lemon wedges
meals.goal_alignment: Low-calorie, high-protein dinner with fiber-rich vegetables for fullness without excess calories

days.day_notes: Mediterranean-inspired day focused on lean proteins and fresh vegetables

meals.description: Fluffy eggs with vegetables and whole grain toast
instructions: Heat olive oil in non-stick pan over medium heat
Sauté diced mushrooms and bell pepper for 3-4 minutes
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Beat eggs and egg whites together with salt and pepper
Pour eggs into pan with vegetables
Scramble gently until eggs are just set
Toast bread and top with sliced avocado
Serve scramble with avocado toast
meals.goal_alignment: High protein breakfast with healthy fats to maintain satiety throughout the morning

meals.description: Spicy ground beef with fresh herbs wrapped in crisp lettuce
instructions: Cook jasmine rice according to package directions
Heat sesame oil in large pan over medium-high heat
Add minced garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add ground beef, cook breaking up with spoon until browned
Add diced bell pepper and carrot, cook 3-4 minutes
Mix in fish sauce and lime juice
Remove from heat, stir in fresh herbs
Serve beef mixture in lettuce cups with rice on the side
meals.goal_alignment: Lean protein with controlled portions of rice and lots of vegetables for volume and nutrients

meals.food_name: Miso-Glazed Salmon with Steamed Edamame and Brown Rice
meals.description: Omega-3 rich salmon with Asian-inspired glaze and nutrient-dense sides
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package directions
Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
Whisk together miso paste, rice vinegar, and mirin
Brush salmon with miso glaze, let marinate 10 minutes
Steam edamame for 5 minutes, season with salt
Bake salmon for 12-15 minutes until flaky
Steam bok choy for 3-4 minutes until tender
Drizzle bok choy with sesame oil
Serve salmon over rice with edamame and bok choy
Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds
meals.goal_alignment: Omega-3 rich salmon provides healthy fats while brown rice and edamame add fiber for satiety

days.day_notes: Asian-inspired flavors with emphasis on lean proteins and nutrient-dense vegetables

variety_score: Excellent variety with Mediterranean and Asian cuisines, different protein sources (Greek yogurt, chicken, cod, eggs, beef, salmon), and diverse cooking methods (grilling, baking, stir-frying, steaming)
goal_alignment: This plan supports weight loss through calorie management while maintaining high protein intake for satiety. Each meal combines lean proteins with fiber-rich vegetables and controlled portions of complex carbohydrates to promote fullness and sustainable weight loss.
shopping_tips: Shop for fresh herbs and vegetables twice weekly for optimal freshness. Buy proteins in bulk and freeze individual portions. Prepare grains like quinoa and brown rice in larger batches to save time. Look for sales on frozen vegetables and fish fillets to stay within budget.
